BP_Action_SpawnEmitter

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_SpawnEmitter

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_SpawnEmitter : public BP_Action_C

Spawns an emitter at the specified location, with an optional input for playing a sound.
